body_html:
I believe the issue is that the function tries to be general in order to handle cases when the input shape is not known at compile time. This might be the case if the image were the result of decode_jpeg, for instance. In this case, the spatial dimensions of the output shape are unknown.

It would be possible to create a special case handling such that if the shape is fully specified in the input, then the shape will be set in the output.
